channel.title: Comments for page "The 11-Tailed Revenge - The Demon Returns"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The 11-Tailed Revenge - The Demon Returns"

item.title: jim
item.content:encoded:
Final Drain!
You strike the monster down, and it roars in frustration, as the trophy of your first encounter flares back to your form! A cry of "NO! NOT AGAIIIIIIN-" as it is angrily ripped from reality, its chance at revenge lost. The Fields recede, and you are dropped unceremoniously to the ground back at the Festival grounds, with no evidence of your epic battle - except for the pitch-black, ragged kimono you now wear.

Either they fixed it, or the admin misspelled.

item.title: Festival message
item.content:encoded:
The Eleven Tails Tasty Snack House

You sniff the Booster, but a familiar scent
puts your teeth on edge -
ozone.. the sweet scent of Lycoris..
and the black, tarry influence of The RNG!

You throw yourself back as the costume splits, and bursting from the discarded shell, eleven stories tall, is the Eleven Tails! You narrowly dodge a dark claw, and it snarls!

"YOU CARRY MY SYMBOL! BY ANCIENT LAW, I HAVE THE RIGHT OF REPRISAL! NOW, YOU DIE!"

(Oh snap. Go to your Phase Menu!)

Is this new? I thought before that you wouldn't be able to get the booster if you had eleven tails already.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Shouldn't it be "except for the pitch-black"? Either it needs to be corrected on here, or it needs the [sic] added…I'd check, but I'm nowhere near fighting the revenge…
